subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Luis Scola, Donald Sloan and Lance Stephenson accounted for all the points in a decisive 12-2 run, thwarting a late charge by the Bulls and sending the Pacers to a 97-80 home victory.
snippet: Luis Scola, Donald Sloan and Lance Stephenson accounted for all the points in a decisive 12-2 run, thwarting a late charge by the Bulls and sending the Pacers to a 97-80 home victory.
